text: Dimaadua ga helekai, “Di madagoaa ga dau mai, gei Au ga hagaduadua digau Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon, Moab, mo digau ala i lodo di anggowaa, ala go digau ala guu dahi gi daha nia ngaahulu o nadau libogo. Digau huogodoo aanei la guu lawa di sirkumsais, gei digaula hagalee e hagagila aga di hagababa dela e haga modongoohia aga go di hai deenei. Deai tangada i digau aanei ge deai hogi tangada i digau Israel dela ne hagagila aga di hagababa deenei ai.”
